thread.title: Nylo NYC
thread.title_full: Nylo NYC - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lisahZ7220UO
title: Nylo NYC
text:
Hotel is very nice. When you check in sometimes they are not so helpful and not nice and not accommodating. But Romona at check-in was excellent!
Romona was accommodating and very nice and makes you feel welcome. The door men are also very good. Location is really the best for me and my family. Upper west side is very good location. Hotel bar has nice atmosphere. I have stayed at the NYLO 7 times and although I wish it was cheaper and wish most of the front desk employees were more accommodating, the hotel is still very nice .
